description: NYC TLC Yellow Taxi Trip Records with fare, location, payment, and congestion pricing details.

schema.name: VendorID
schema.description: TPEP provider code (1=Creative Mobile Technologies, 2=Curb Mobility, 6=Myle Technologies, 7=Helix)

schema.name: tpep_pickup_datetime
schema.description: Date and time when the meter was engaged

schema.name: tpep_dropoff_datetime
schema.description: Date and time when the meter was disengaged

schema.name: passenger_count
schema.description: Number of passengers in the vehicle

schema.name: trip_distance
schema.description: Elapsed trip distance in miles reported by the taximeter

schema.name: RatecodeID
schema.description: Final rate code (1=Standard, 2=JFK, 3=Newark, 4=Nassau/Westchester, 5=Negotiated, 6=Group ride, 99=Unknown)

schema.name: store_and_fwd_flag
schema.description: Y if trip was stored in vehicle memory before transmission, N otherwise

schema.name: PULocationID
schema.description: TLC Taxi Zone where the meter was engaged

schema.name: DOLocationID
schema.description: TLC Taxi Zone where the meter was disengaged

schema.name: payment_type
schema.description: Payment method (0=Flex Fare, 1=Credit Card, 2=Cash, 3=No Charge, 4=Dispute, 5=Unknown, 6=Voided)

schema.name: fare_amount
schema.description: Time-and-distance fare calculated by the meter

schema.name: extra
schema.description: Miscellaneous extras and surcharges

schema.name: mta_tax
schema.description: MTA tax automatically triggered based on metered rate

schema.name: tip_amount
schema.description: Tip amount (credit card tips only; cash tips excluded)

schema.name: tolls_amount
schema.description: Total tolls paid during the trip

schema.name: improvement_surcharge
schema.description: Improvement surcharge applied at flag drop

schema.name: total_amount
schema.description: Total amount charged to passengers (excluding cash tips)

schema.name: congestion_surcharge
schema.description: NYS congestion surcharge collected for the trip

schema.name: airport_fee
schema.description: Airport pickup fee (LaGuardia and JFK only)

schema.name: cbd_congestion_fee
schema.description: Per-trip MTA Congestion Relief Zone fee (effective Jan 5, 2025)
